short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives users the ability to roll in dndbeyond and see results in discord! Just add discord webhookURL!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gives anyone the ability to roll dice on www.dndbeyond.com and have the dice roll sent in a discord channel of their your choosing!

Setup by creating a webhook bot in discord (Server Settings -> Integrations -> Webhooks) and providing this chrome extension with the webhook URL and the highlighting color of your choice!  

Any click on a highlighted dice on your player card, will send to discord!
